lyrics.en: Some once upon a time is not where our myth belongs
lyrics.zh: 吾等的神話不會僅屈居於那些「從前從前」

lyrics.en: Through the faded lines of words and rhyme is a hidden song
lyrics.zh: 墨水淡去的字韻間藏著的是另一首歌曲

lyrics.en: Though fractured, deeply warmed by sorrows from time and time again
lyrics.zh: 縱使一次次意志被摧折殆盡 一次次被悲傷消磨信心

lyrics.en: Take my hand and enter our pretend
lyrics.zh: 仍願牽起我的手 進入所謂「虛構」的世界

lyrics.en: By star-lit skies, endlessly writing
lyrics.zh: 星辰點亮的夜空下 譜寫故事的筆未曾停歇

lyrics.en: Inviting those along
lyrics.zh: 沿路邀請那些

lyrics.en: Lost souls who hear our song when gone astray
lyrics.zh: 在迷途中聽見我們歌曲的失落靈魂

lyrics.en: Though strife's part of life, stay unafraid now
lyrics.zh: 儘管爭執是生命中的必經 此時此刻 展現無畏

lyrics.en: When forces say 'behave', we say instead, 'Be Brave'
lyrics.zh: 當強權告訴我們「嚴守你的本份」 我們如此對自己說道 「英勇向前」

lyrics.en: In a desperate shout, our souls reach out with pen toward every page
lyrics.zh: 隨著一聲拚上所有的吶喊 靈魂自心底向外延伸 執筆向著生命的每一頁

lyrics.en: We ignite, come alive, like a starry night
lyrics.zh: 焰光一閃 無生氣的文字逐漸蓬勃 像是繁星熠熠生輝的夜晚

lyrics.en: With a fire no doubts can take away
lyrics.zh: 區區質疑澆不熄我們心懷的熱情之火

lyrics.en: Got no fairy tale
lyrics.zh: 世上才沒有如童話般

lyrics.en: When love prevails
lyrics.zh: 只憑「熱情」就能「所向披靡」的地方

lyrics.en: Though painful, now we move endlessly on
lyrics.zh: 儘管承受著痛苦 此刻我們持續前行

lyrics.en: By the light- your spark
lyrics.zh: 循著你們給予的細碎火星

lyrics.en: Head first, into the dark
lyrics.zh: 縱身 躍入黑暗深淵

lyrics.en: Some once upon a time is not where a voice get heard
lyrics.zh: 靠著單薄的一些「從前從前」並無法傳達其中真意

lyrics.en: Will the faded lines of speeding time make us flightless birds？
lyrics.zh: 時間飛逝所留下的淡淡刻痕 是否會使我們成為折翼之鳥？

lyrics.en: When pen is running dry, a soul on fire is driven to react
lyrics.zh: 筆的墨水逐漸見底 激起燃燒的靈魂綻裂耀眼的光采

lyrics.en: And when burning flames attack, we will never fade to black
lyrics.zh: 而當狂暴的烈炎襲來 我們也永不黯淡

lyrics.en: Though fake it seems, not a dream or a trick of light
lyrics.zh: 縱使虛假 它似乎既非夢境亦非作弄人的光影

lyrics.en: Always vacancy, take a seat, it's our story's time
lyrics.zh: 此處永遠虛位以待 請坐下 聆聽我們的神話吧

lyrics.en: A word is brought to life, through voices five and as 'real' as they say
lyrics.zh: 五道聲音 替這個呆板的世界賦予了生命 變得如他們口中般「真實」

lyrics.en: Pen as sword, we're choosing fate, we can never lose our way
lyrics.zh: 以筆為劍 我們正將命運掌握在手中 我們絕不可能迷失這條路

lyrics.en: By star-lit skies, endlessly writing
lyrics.zh: 星辰點亮的夜空下 譜寫故事的筆未曾停歇

lyrics.en: Inviting those along
lyrics.zh: 沿路邀請那些

lyrics.en: Lost souls who hear our song when gone astray
lyrics.zh: 在迷途中聽見我們歌曲的失落靈魂

lyrics.en: Though strife's part of life, stay unafraid now
lyrics.zh: 儘管爭執是生命中的必經 此時此刻 展現無畏

lyrics.en: When forces say 'behave', we say instead, 'Be Brave'
lyrics.zh: 當強權告訴我們「嚴守你的本份」 我們如此對自己說道 「英勇向前」

lyrics.en: Defiant 'til the end, I'll stay killing
lyrics.zh: 奮戰到底 我將在此屹立不搖

lyrics.en: To sing
lyrics.zh: 放聲高歌

lyrics.en: I'll dance in burning embers unyielding
lyrics.zh: 我不屈地於殘存火光的灰燼中起舞

lyrics.en: Your love's given me wings
lyrics.zh: 因你的愛而重生出了雙翼

lyrics.en: While learning to remember the good times we bring
lyrics.zh: 在我們學習珍惜那些共同創造的快樂回憶時

lyrics.en: Our ocean's finally full of life
lyrics.zh: 我們的海洋總算充滿生機

lyrics.en: Set every vital piece in motion
lyrics.zh: 讓每塊重要的齒輪都開始運轉

lyrics.en: Now we write
lyrics.zh: 如今 我們提起了筆

lyrics.en: In a desperate shout, our souls reach out
lyrics.zh: 隨著一聲拚上所有的吶喊 靈魂自心底向外延伸

lyrics.en: With pen toward every page
lyrics.zh: 執筆向著生命的每一頁

lyrics.en: We ignite, come alive like a starry night
lyrics.zh: 焰光一閃 無生氣的文字逐漸蓬勃 像是繁星熠熠生輝的夜晚

lyrics.en: With a fire no doubts can take away
lyrics.zh: 區區質疑澆不熄我們心懷的熱情之火

lyrics.en: Write a fairy tale
lyrics.zh: 寫下如童話般天馬行空

lyrics.en: Where love prevails, cliched, maybe, we move joyfully on
lyrics.zh: 只要心懷「愛」便能「所向披靡」的世界 也許那過於老套 但我們享受其中

lyrics.en: By the light- your spark
lyrics.zh: 循著你們給予的細碎火星

lyrics.en: Hopeless days are just a part of being free
lyrics.zh: 絕望的日子只是自由的一部分

lyrics.en: We wrote it all by heart
lyrics.zh: 我們嘔心瀝血寫下一頁頁回憶

lyrics.en: And smile, side by side among the stars
lyrics.zh: 然後 在星辰左右相伴下 並肩微笑
